io.lettuce.core.protocol

类 RedisStateMachine

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.lettuce.core.protocol.RedisStateMachine

  • public class RedisStateMachine
extends Object
    State machine that decodes redis server responses encoded according to the Unified Request Protocol (RESP).

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      RedisStateMachine()
      Initialize a new instance.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void close()
      Close the state machine to free resources.
      boolean decode(ByteBuf buffer, CommandOutput<?,?,?> output)
      Decode a command using the input buffer.
      boolean decode(ByteBuf buffer, RedisCommand<?,?,?> command, CommandOutput<?,?,?> output)
      Attempt to decode a redis response and return a flag indicating whether a complete response was read.
      void reset()
      Reset the state machine.
      protected void safeMulti(CommandOutput<?,?,?> output, int count, RedisCommand<?,?,?> command)
      Safely sets CommandOutput.multi(int).

      Safely sets CommandOutput.set(ByteBuffer).

    • 方法详细资料

      • decode

        public boolean decode(ByteBuf buffer,
                      CommandOutput<?,?,?> output)
        Decode a command using the input buffer.
        参数:
        buffer - Buffer containing data from the server.
        output - Current command output.
        返回:
        true if a complete response was read.

      • decode

        public boolean decode(ByteBuf buffer,
                      RedisCommand<?,?,?> command,
                      CommandOutput<?,?,?> output)
        Attempt to decode a redis response and return a flag indicating whether a complete response was read.
        参数:
        buffer - Buffer containing data from the server.
        command - the command itself
        output - Current command output.
        返回:
        true if a complete response was read.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Reset the state machine.

      • close

        public void close()
        Close the state machine to free resources.

      • safeSet

        protected void safeSet(CommandOutput<?,?,?> output,
                       long integer,
                       RedisCommand<?,?,?> command)
        Safely sets CommandOutput.set(long). Completes a command exceptionally in case an exception occurs.
        参数:
        output -
        integer -
        command -
